importUsers.introText: This dialog can be used to import users.
importUsers.dialogText:
Each entry in the input file must contain a value for either matriculation number or login.
Values for last and first name are optional.

csvFile.label: Select .csv file
csvFile.tooltip: Please select the .csv file containing the students for the import. Either 'LOGIN' or 'REGISTRATION_NUMBER' column values must be present per entry. Use the following format: login, matriculation number, firstname, lastname

studentsForImport.label: Users to import
studentsForImport.tooltip: These students will be imported when clicking on the "Import" button.
